version_description:
* Raised basic energy limit
* Raised the energy increment following the increase in Island Level
* Clerical error occurred when collecting mine themed 'Peanut Bush
* And other miner bugs are fixed

* NEW - New area "Ownerless Labyrinth" is available now!
* NEW - Seasonal event "Spring’s Dice Game" is awaiting!
* Added - Building Edit Mode
* Added - Area Exploration Progress system
* Added - 'Traveler List' system to Lighthouse
* Modified - Requests from Fufu's Merchant Ship & Jayla's Hot Air Balloon
- And contents modifications & minor bugfixes.
